message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $145. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price. I believe you'll find its value exceeds the cost significantly.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would you consider offering the product for $130?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to consider your proposal. Therefore, I would like to offer the product to you for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $128 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I've taken into account your budget considerations and am willing to meet you halfway. I propose we settle on a price of $132 for the product.
